name: Inner Space (Wrong Planet Right Game)
description:
Small arcade shooter. 

GAME
Walls, enemies, bullets, everything you touch kills you. Survive and get a high score.

CONTROLS
Move: Selected keys
Aim/Shoot: Mouse
Music on/off: M

CONTEXT

This game was made for the VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021.

Made by a one-person team over the course of 2 days. 
No external assets were used, everything was made for the jam (sprites, music and sounds).

Visuals made with Aseprite 1.3-beta
Music and sounds made with Deflemask
Code is pure Java with libGDX 1.10.0 (Gradle as the project manager for the web export)

This the first time, I publish a "finished" project.
I am not a graphic designer, I am not a music composer, I can barely code properly!

Hopefully not my last game, hopefully not my best game ;)
